author: RTÉ News
title: US stocks show early uptick as markets open
description: Wall Street's main indexes opened higher on Wednesday for the third straight session, on hopes that the coronavirus outbreak in the United States was nearing its peak and expectations that Congress will push through more aid for the battered economy.
content:
Wall Street's main indexes opened higher on Wednesday for the third straight session, on hopes that the coronavirus outbreak in the United States was nearing its peak and expectations that Congress will push through more aid for the battered economy.
